# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for Purchase of an EDXRF Spectrometer

**Reference Number:** cb-238-31088958

**Amendment Number:** 6

**Tender Announcement Number:** 1000252218

**Publication Date:** November 3, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2023, at 18:00:00

## Overview
Health Canada is issuing a Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for the purchase of an Energy Dispersive X-ray fluorescence (EDXRF) spectrometer. The proposed procurement aims to support regulatory development, risk management, and risk assessment of chemical hazards in consumer products, cosmetics, and vaping products.

## Details
* **Contract Category:** Government Department (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Selection Criteria:** Variations or combinations of the above methods
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

## Contract Details
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 24, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 15, 2024
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions related to this notice, please contact:
Sami Nouh, Buyer
Email: [sami.nouh@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:sami.nouh@hc-sc.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 324-8061

A detailed tender package, including specifications, requirements, and evaluation criteria, is available for download at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24059/1000252218---npp.pdf.
